hero.title: I create professional websites for businesses in Barcelona and throughout Spain
hero.subtitle: Need to create a website for your business? I'm a freelance web developer specialized in creating modern, fast and Google-optimized websites. Custom design, official invoice and satisfaction guarantee. Free quote with no commitment.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a freelance web developer in Barcelona specialized in creating websites for businesses. If you're looking for someone to create a website for your business, you're in the right place. I help businesses in Barcelona (Eixample, Gràcia, Sants-Montjuïc, Poblenou, Ciutat Vella, Sarrià-Sant Gervasi), Spain and internationally create professional websites that convert visitors into customers.
about.value: My commitment is to offer quality web development services with complete transparency: official invoicing, satisfaction guarantee, and a close, personalized relationship. Every website I create is optimized for Google and designed to generate results. I work with businesses throughout Barcelona and the local business community.
benefits: Proven experience creating websites for businesses across various sectors in Barcelona
Knowledge of the Barcelona business community and its needs
Modern technologies for fast and secure websites
Competitive quality-price ratio for your business

features.title: Solutions that generate results
features.description: I develop professional websites that not only look amazing but also deliver measurable results for your business.

items.title: Optimized Performance and Security
items.description: High-performance web development with ultra-fast loading times and advanced threat protection.

items.title: Custom and Unique Design
items.description: Exclusive and modern designs that reflect your brand identity and connect with your audience.

items.title: SEO and Online Visibility
items.description: Professional search engine optimization that improves your Google ranking and increases organic traffic.

items.title: Maintenance and Technical Support
items.description: Regular updates, backups, and continuous technical support to keep your website always up to date.

process.title: Work Process
process.description: A proven method to guarantee exceptional results in every project.

steps.title: Consulting and Strategy
steps.description: We analyze your business, goals, and competition to create an effective digital strategy.

steps.title: Design and Development
steps.description: We create a custom design and develop your website with the best market technologies.

steps.title: Testing and Optimization
steps.description: We perform thorough testing of performance, security, and usability before launch.

steps.title: Launch and Support
steps.description: We publish your website and accompany you with training, documentation, and continuous support.

guarantee.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
guarantee.description: I'm so confident in the quality of my work that I offer a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with the result, we'll work together until you are. Your success is my success.

testimonials.title: What My Clients Say
testimonials.description: My clients' satisfaction is my best introduction.

items.name: María García
items.content: Excellent professional. Delivered the project in record time and exceeded all our expectations. The website is fast, modern, and has significantly increased our conversions.

items.name: Carlos Rodríguez
items.content: Very satisfied with the result. The process was transparent, communication was fluid, and the final result is exactly what we needed for our business.

items.name: Laura Martínez
items.content: My online store has exceeded all my expectations. Sales have increased by 200% since launch. Totally recommended.

items.name: Jordi Puig
items.content: We needed to create a website for our restaurant in Barcelona. Ignacio perfectly understood what we were looking for and created a website that perfectly reflects our style. Online reservations have increased by 150%.

items.name: Ana Fernández
items.content: As a startup in Barcelona, we needed a professional website but with a tight budget. Ignacio helped us create exactly what we needed. Excellent quality-price ratio and impeccable service.

items.name: Roberto Sánchez
items.content: Working with Ignacio was a pleasure. Professional, punctual and with excellent knowledge of web development. Our new website has significantly improved our online presence in Barcelona.

pricing.title: Approximate Investment
pricing.description: Every project is unique. These ranges give you an idea of the investment based on the type of website you need.
pricing.featuresNote: Features are defined based on your specific needs
pricing.customDescription: If you need something more complex like a web application, CRM, or custom system, contact me for a personalized quote.

tiers.name: Landing Page
tiers.description: Perfect for launches, specific campaigns, or individual services.

tiers.name: Corporate Website
tiers.description: Professional complete website for companies seeking solid online presence.

tiers.name: E-commerce
tiers.description: Complete online store to sell your products or services 24/7.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: We answer your questions about the website development process.

items.question: How long does it take to complete my website?
items.answer: Development time depends on the project's complexity. A simple one-page landing page can be ready in 2-4 days, while a more complex project may take 4-6 weeks.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: I accept bank transfers, Bizum, and credit cards. Payment is divided into two parts: 50% at the start of the project and 50% before final delivery.

items.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
items.answer: Your satisfaction is my priority. We'll work together on necessary revisions until you're completely satisfied with the result.

items.question: Do you offer maintenance service?
items.answer: Yes, I offer monthly maintenance plans that include updates, backups, and technical support to keep your website secure and up to date.
